byline.original: By FLAVIO RIBEIRO, FRANCISCO SOUZA, MAXWELL DA SILVA and THOMPSON MARZAGÃO

abstract: We’re open sourcing our video transcoding API and video encoding presets, as part of our plan to open source our video encoding and distribution pipeline.

headline.main: Using Microservices to Encode and Publish Videos at The New York Times
